Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=6.25 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC43300 (MIC=6.25 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=100 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ML-35P (MIC=25 µg/ml), Psecdomonas aeruginosa PA01 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Psecdomonas aeruginosa ATCC27853 (MIC=6.25 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.22009138]No cytotoxic against HUVEC or  RMMCs at the concentration of 0.4 mg/ml.
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Also has antifungal activity against C. albicans.

Literature.Title: Amphibian cathelicidin fills the evolutionary gap of cathelicidin in vertebrate.
Literature.Author: Hao X, Yang H, Wei L, Yang S, Zhu W, Ma D, Yu H, Lai R.
